comments:
Received the following error messages when deleting a vdisk from a SVC Cimom
 
2007.01.10 11:07:35.078-08:00 HWN021515E The invocation of CIM method ReturnToStoragePool failed on CIMOM https://9.47.97.237:5999 with the following exception text: org.sblim.wbem.cim.CIMException: CIM_ERR_FAILED(CIMClient is not bounded to a CIMOM)   org.eclipse.aperi.disk.common.CIM.VolumeManagementSVC invokeAsyncCIMMethod

Volume Aperi on subsystem SVC-2145-Purple2-IBM could not be deleted. @(-9223372036854747002;[-9223372036854775773,0,1];8;DiskManagerThread-1 - deleteStorageVolumes([org.eclipse.aperi.disk.control.util.DeleteStorageVolumesParameter: {CIMOM: null; Storage Volume IDs: {}}]))   org.eclipse.aperi.disk.control.StorageConfigurationPluginSVC deleteStorageVolumes

After discussing with Ted, we would like to declare this defect as a known issue and fix it at a later time.
Lower the Severity to be Normal
ExtensionManager caches instances created from plugins, but VolumeManagement holds class variables and can not be chared/reused
